ygData.subject: Re: Qeynos Quests
ygData.msgSnippet: You do not need to do any other quests to get the Arlena quest. All you need to do is Hail him for that one. As far as payoffs. At least when i did them,
ygData.messageBody:
You do not need to do any other quests to get the
Arlena quest. All you need to do is "Hail" him for
that one.

As far as payoffs. At least when i did them, which was
quite a while ago, there was no great rewards. Though
i will say that they were indeed fun to do. Most
however will be extremely easy for you now. They are
mostly for level 12 and under.

The Arlena quest is a 30 plus though.

And as far as Grimrot goes, we went on 3 different
trips and waited an hour each time before he finally
showed up.

Good Luck

Bathory D'Allatu
Minions of Darkness
Cazic-Thule

--- Jeremy Pollack <jpollack@...> wrote:
> From: "Jeremy Pollack" <jpollack@...>
>
> I am an Innoruuk worshipping Shadowknight so I am
> not particularly welcomed
> in Qeynos (um, does this have anything to do with
> the 20 or so guards I have
> killed? Heh) but I was wondering, do all the Grimrot
> quests originate in
> Qeynos, or can I just talk to Grimrot himself? I'm
> currently in S Karana
> anyways, but can't ever seem to catch him. I have no
> idea who this Arlena is
> but I hope to find out soon if I can ever catch this
> guy. :)
>
> How many SK quests are there in Qeynos and are there
> any that are worth it?
>
> Thanks,
> Virten
> Human SK of Neriak, 21st training
